# ip-pagination

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute               | Description | Type     | Default                     |
| -------------------- | ----------------------- | ----------- | -------- | --------------------------- |
| `currentPage`        | `current-page`          |             | `number` | `1`                         |
| `firstPageAriaLabel` | `first-page-aria-label` |             | `string` | `'Go to the first page'`    |
| `lastPageAriaLabel`  | `last-page-aria-label`  |             | `string` | `'Go to the last page'`     |
| `nextPageAriaLabel`  | `next-page-aria-label`  |             | `string` | `'Go to the next page'`     |
| `prevPageAriaLabel`  | `prev-page-aria-label`  |             | `string` | `'Go to the previous page'` |
| `totalPages`         | `total-pages`           |             | `number` | `10`                        |
| `visiblePages`       | `visible-pages`         |             | `number` | `5`                         |


## Events

| Event         | Description | Type                  |
| ------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `pageChanged` |             | `CustomEvent<number>` |
